2239.verse: ۞ وَتَرَكْنَا|And We (will) leave|148|164|8864$بَعْضَهُمْ|some of them|110|141|2240$يَوْمَئِذٍ|(on) that Day|111|142|3485$يَمُوجُ|to surge|75|106|11031$فِى|over|49|80|89$بَعْضٍ‌ۖ|others,|76|92|1316$وَنُفِخَ|and (will be) blown|145|155|11032$فِى|in|48|68|89$ٱلصُّورِ|the trumpet,|104|124|5734$فَجَمَعْنَـٰهُمْ|then We (will) gather them|199|218|11033$جَمْعًا|all together.|101|111|11034$

2240.verse: وَعَرَضْنَا|And We (will) present|163|173|11035$جَهَنَّمَ|Hell|69|88|2655$يَوْمَئِذٍ|(on) that Day|111|130|3485$لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|to the disbelievers,|147|166|236$عَرْضًا|(on) display|98|108|11036$

2242.verse: أَفَحَسِبَ|Do then think|109|126|11041$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|123|20$كَفَرُوٓاْ|disbelieve|84|118|59$أَن|that|48|82|655$يَتَّخِذُواْ|they (can) take|125|159|4589$عِبَادِى|My servants|101|118|1611$مِن دُونِىٓ|besides Me|111|132|10215$أَوْلِيَآءَ‌ۚ|(as) protectors?|128|170|2754$إِنَّآ|Indeed, We -|108|150|120$أَعْتَدْنَا|We have prepared|141|183|3827$جَهَنَّمَ|Hell|69|90|2655$لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|for the disbelievers|146|348|236$نُزُلاً|(as) a lodging.|116|318|3650$

2243.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|66|765$هَلْ|"Shall|56|88|1829$نُنَبِّئُكُم|We inform you|115|147|11042$بِٱلْأَخْسَرِينَ|of the greatest losers|164|196|11043$أَعْمَـٰلاً|(as to their) deeds?|152|168|11044$

2244.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those -|72|86|20$ضَلَّ|is lost|63|90|1017$سَعْيُهُمْ|their effort|92|119|10289$فِى|in|48|75|89$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|the life|82|109|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world,|117|144|818$وَهُمْ|while they|88|102|256$يَحْسَبُونَ|think|101|139|11045$أَنَّهُمْ|that they|83|159|461$يُحْسِنُونَ|(were) acquiring good|165|241|11046$صُنْعًا|(in) work."|89|127|11047$

2245.verse: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|105|51$ٱلَّذِينَ|(are) the ones who|148|194|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|130|59$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ|in the Verses|107|154|609$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord,|118|141|54$وَلِقَآئِهِۦ|and the meeting (with) Him.|206|212|11048$فَحَبِطَتْ|So (are) vain|107|120|11049$أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ|their deeds,|99|112|1908$فَلَا|so not|62|75|208$نُقِيمُ|We will assign|112|125|11050$لَهُمْ|for them|76|82|98$يَوْمَ|(on) the Day|105|181|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection|159|310|820$وَزْنًا|any weight.|98|174|11051$

2246.verse: ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|75|28$جَزَآؤُهُمْ|(is) their recompense -|173|196|3078$جَهَنَّمُ|Hell -|69|92|1813$بِمَا|because|75|98|43$كَفَرُواْ|they disbelieved,|132|155|59$وَٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ|and took|98|109|10857$ءَايَـٰتِى|My Verses|88|170|6043$وَرُسُلِى|and My Messengers|150|314|11052$هُزُوًا|(in) ridicule.|99|181|659$

2247.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|84|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|117|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believed|82|110|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and did|92|120|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds,|130|158|239$كَانَتْ لَهُمْ|for them will be|122|136|11053$جَنَّـٰتُ|Gardens|75|160|9435$ٱلْفِرْدَوْسِ|(of) the Paradise|132|303|11054$نُزُلاً|(as) a lodging,|116|202|3650$

2248.verse: خَـٰلِدِينَ|Abiding forever|119|135|1409$فِيهَا|in it.|54|86|253$لَا|Not|43|75|30$يَبْغُونَ|they will desire|119|151|3063$عَنْهَا|from it|63|95|380$حِوَلاً|any transfer.|106|122|11055$

2238.verse: [Dhul-Qarnayn] said, "This is a mercy from my Lord; but when the promise of my Lord comes, He will make it level, and ever is the promise of my Lord true."

2239.verse: And We will leave them that day surging over each other, and [then] the Horn will be blown, and We will assemble them in [one] assembly.

2240.verse: And We will present Hell that Day to the Disbelievers, on display -

2241.verse: Those whose eyes had been within a cover [removed] from My remembrance, and they were not able to hear.

2242.verse: Then do those who disbelieve think that they can take My servants instead of Me as allies? Indeed, We have prepared Hell for the disbelievers as a lodging.

2243.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Shall we [believers] inform you of the greatest losers as to [their] deeds?

2244.verse: [They are] those whose effort is lost in worldly life, while they think that they are doing well in work."

2245.verse: Those are the ones who disbelieve in the verses of their Lord and in [their] meeting Him, so their deeds have become worthless; and We will not assign to them on the Day of Resurrection any importance.

2246.verse: That is their recompense - Hell - for what they denied and [because] they took My signs and My messengers in ridicule.

2247.verse: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - they will have the Gardens of Paradise as a lodging,

2248.verse: Wherein they abide eternally. They will not desire from it any transfer.

2249.verse: Say, "If the sea were ink for [writing] the words of my Lord, the sea would be exhausted before the words of my Lord were exhausted, even if We brought the like of it as a supplement."

2250.verse: Say, "I am only a man like you, to whom has been revealed that your god is one God. So whoever would hope for the meeting with his Lord - let him do righteous work and not associate in the worship of his Lord anyone."
